backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with storage mixins, access control, and all data models for membership, users, deals, buyers, contracts, analytics, and ID counters.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration logic that updates membership pricing if old defaults are detected while preserving custom admin pricing.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries linking frontend file changes to membership pricing updates and monthly pricing display requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides a mapping of frontend file paths to short summaries describing each component or page’s functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme and color variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry managing authentication, theme, actor initialization, profile loading, and lazy-loading the app shell.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen showing an access-denied message with an optional back button.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: Component displaying AI deal analysis results including ARV, MAO, comps, and rating with styled badges.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Provides the main app layout with a sidebar, page navigation, lazy‑loaded pages, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays a compact buyer summary with contact info, preferences, and an edit button.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Modal dialog for creating, updating, and deleting buyers with form fields and validation.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Fetches and lists contract files for a deal, showing errors, loading states, and view buttons.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Handles contract file selection, validation, and upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Shows a brief deal summary including address, seller, ARV, offer, and estimated profit with edit control.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Modal for creating or editing deals, managing fields like stage, pricing, buyers, and notes.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: Displays a lock screen for gated features with an upgrade button dispatching a membership navigation event.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Builds a 6‑month bar chart summarizing closed profit and estimated fees from deal data.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog collecting basic user info and submitting it via a profile‑save mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Renders a table of zip codes and corresponding total profit values.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Sign‑in UI using Internet Identity with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Error screen showing a failure message and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Full‑screen loading view with background art, logo, and spinner.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Similar to useActor but with safer admin‑token initialization and exposes error and refetch state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, deals, buyers, contracts, analytics, and membership data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Centralized UI text constants for navigation, errors, empty states, locked features, and admin messages.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Implements helper functions for calculating MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fees.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Contains membership access checks, deal limits, and a generic locked feature message formatter.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Utility functions to format cents to USD strings and parse USD strings back to cents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing catalog, updating membership pricing, and granting membership tiers.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Displays analytics metrics and profit-by-zip tables for Enterprise users, with locking for lower tiers.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Lists and manages buyers with create/edit functionality, gated behind Pro or Enterprise access.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Renders the contracts management interface with deal selection, access control, and upload/view components. Handles loading, errors, and empty states for deals.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays key deal metrics, a monthly performance chart, and current membership info. Loads user and deal data to populate dashboard stats.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: Provides an AI-powered deal analyzer with address input, analysis results, and the ability to create a new deal from the analysis. Manages form state, API calls, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Shows all deals organized by stage with creation and editing options, enforcing membership limits for Basic users. Supports loading states and deal editor dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Displays membership plans, pricing, and features with fallback pricing and upgrade/downgrade actions. Handles catalog loading errors and saving updated user profiles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Maintains project metadata including schema version, features, and pending feature requests for membership pricing updates.
